nodes.bodyText: Is this the best way to handle this? 🤔 My concern here is that the toString() of the Diagnostic impl is duplicated here. How about creating a copy of the whole Diagnostic instance? Maybe add a builder API to Diagnostic to make it easier to create copies of Diagnostic instances?
We can go with this for now though, and maybe revisit later.
IMO, creating new diagnostics kinda going out of its definition, isn't it? Here, We only need to change the position and print right ?

Yeah, converting the diagnostic to a 1-based position. My concern is this feels like a rather ad hoc solution and duplicates the toString() of the diagnostic implementation. My point was whether we should consider having a proper util/API for converting a given diagnostic to 1-based positions.
But I guess we can go with this for now and revisit this later.
